institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Industry-led youth customized training business operation rules/Article 25 (Implementation of charges)
contents: Article 25 (Implementation of charges) ① The business group shall bear the charges pursuant to Article 19 (1) 3 and Appendix 5 of the Operation Regulations by the deadline set by the Deliberation Committee. ② The chairman of the board shall bear part or all of the charges. If this is not done, the support amount must be reduced in accordance with the ratio corresponding to the amount not borne, or if support has already been received, it must be returned. ③ The Chairman shall provide labor costs, training facilities, and Exemption from charges for equipment costs.
